title: Overwatch takes over LoL in Korea
body:
Others might eventually win something in LoL!

Sorry, I'm fiercely Australian in almost everything, but eSports.

eSports just brings out massive Korean pride - haha, I know, I know, biggest bandwagon bitch.

replies.body: oce is the least developed in the world when comes to lol esports, even garena has a better setup

> [{quoted}](name=Arkangyle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V0PNppKO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-15T05:54:25.639+0000)
>
> Garena is toxic af tho

So is oce
